pages.text: Steel is one of the most important alloys for all things technological. Simple re-smelting of iron will not complete the process. The simplest method of creating steel is through crucible steel, named thus for it is created in the $(l:machines/crucible)Crucible$(). More advanced technologies allow for direct alloying in and $(l:machines/induction_furnace)Induction Furnace$().
Created by blasting iron in the Blast Furnace. Used to create Wrought Iron and Cast Iron
Created by cooking pig iron in a $(l:machines/beehive_oven)Beehive Oven$(). Used to create Steel and sheetmetal.
